problem_text_cn: 如图,在△ABC中,∠ABC=90°,DE垂直平分AC,垂足为O,AD∥BC,且AB=3,BC=4,则AD的长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, ∠ABC = N_0, DE bisects AC perpendicularly, the vertical foot is O, AD ∥ BC, and AB = N_1, BC = N_2, then the length of AD is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵Rt△ABC中,∠ABC=90°,AB=3,BC=4,∴AC=√{AB²{+BC}²}=√{3²{+4}²}=5,∵DE垂直平分AC,垂足为O,∴OA=\frac{1}{2}AC=\frac{5}{2},∠AOD=∠B=90°,∵AD∥BC,∴∠A=∠C,∴△AOD∽△CBA,∴\frac{AD}{AC}=\frac{OA}{BC},即\frac{AD}{5}=\frac{2.5}{4},解得AD=\frac{25}{8},故选:B．
raw_comment: 本题考查的是勾股定理及相似三角形的判定与性质,熟知在任何一个直角三角形中,两条直角边长的平方之和一定等于斜边长的平方是解答此题的关键．
